title: Consistent 106 MS

replies.body: I usually have a constant ping of around 250, and my game works just great.

If your ping is spiking up to 700ms while playing, it could be due to an unstable connection that is only showing up on your Windows pc. Even if your Mac never has connection issues, there could still be something affecting your Windows connection such as firewall or DNS settings. 

Go through the steps in our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) so we can rule that out as a possibility, and let me know if you have any issues!
